comment._content: William Wallace McCredie (1862-1935), judge, Congressman from Washington State, and baseball team president: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_W._McCredie bioproj.sabr.org/bioproj.cfm?a=v&v=l&bid=2277&... His wife was called Alice.
